made by humansartificialHer bouquet was made of artificial flowers.syntheticThe tyres are made with synthetic rubber.man-madeNylon is a man-made fibre.fakeHe was selling fake fur jackets.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Natural and artificial
[ C or U ] an occasion when someone or something imitates another person or thing: in imitation of Ten-year-olds have started wearing lipstick and make-up in imitation of the older girls.do an imitation of She can do a wonderful imitation of a blackbird's song.
C2 [ C ] a copy: cheap imitation His songs are just cheap (= low quality) imitations of Beatles tunes.

something copied, or the act of copying: Freya does a pretty good imitation of her science teacher.
not real but produced as a copy of something real: [ C ] imitation leather
